missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> gains +1 {G}.
{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> cannot be pushed by Rebel abilities.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> is attacked while adjacent to a Stormtrooper or <color="red">Stormtrooper</color> who could be a target of that attack, that figure becomes the target of the attack.
{-} The red Rebel mission token represents Luke Skywalker.
{-} Once per activation, a hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to close the open door closest to Luke. Doors that have been opened after setup cannot be closed again.
{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} When all heroes are wounded, <color="red">Darth Vader</color> can attack Luke.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> finishes his activation adjacent to Luke, he attacks him.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 6 or when <color="red">Darth Vader</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Darth Vader</color> attacks Luke.
missionProperties.campaignName: Darth Vader (Lord of the Sith) Figure Pack
missionProperties.repositionOverride: All except <color="red">Darth Vader</color>, Stormtroopers: Block the Rebels' line of sight to <color="red">Darth Vader</color>.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You accompany Luke Skywalker on a secret sabotage mission. The target is an Imperial stronghold, and your task is to guard the Rebellionâ€™s hero. 

You're holding the facility entrance as a communication comes in. "Vader is coming! Get out now!"

eventActions.customText:
{-} This figure discards each Harmful condition, then suffers 1 {H} for each condition discarded. If this figure would be defeated, it is not defeated until the end of this activation.
{Q}{A} BRUTALITY: Move 4 to engage 2 or more Rebels. Then, attack each adjacent Rebel.
{Q} Move 4 to attack {R1}.
{A} FORCE CHOKE: Move 2 toward {R1}. Then that figure suffers 2 {H} and 1 {C}.
{A} Move 6 toward {R1}.
{-} FORCE PULL: Place the two closest Stormtroopers or <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> adjacent to this figure.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> gains +1 {G}.
{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> cannot be pushed by Rebel abilities.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> is attacked while adjacent to a Stormtrooper or <color="red">Stormtrooper</color> who could be a target of that attack, that figure becomes the target of the attack.
{-} The red Rebel mission token represents Luke Skywalker.
{-} Once per activation, a hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to close the open door closest to Luke. Doors that have been opened after setup cannot be closed again.
{-} Doors are locked. A figure can attack a door (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} When all heroes are wounded, <color="red">Darth Vader</color> can attack Luke.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> finishes his activation adjacent to Luke, he attacks him.
{-} The Rebels win at the end of Round 6 or when <color="red">Darth Vader</color> is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when <color="red">Darth Vader</color> attacks Luke.
{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

events.eventText:
Behind you, the noise of an explosion rings through the hall. Luke comes through on your comlink, "I'm all done back here and opened another exit for us. Follow me out!"

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

From down the hall, you hear Luke cry out. Running in, you see Vader standing over a disarmed and defeated Skywalker. As the Dark Lord closes in, you blast a hole to the outside, With Vader distracted by the explosion, you grab Luke and dive through the hole in the wall, blaster fire raining all around you.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire earns <color="red">Darth Vader</color> (Lord of the Sith) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Outer Door leads deeper into the facility, towards Luke. It won't withstand Darth Vader for long.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText: The door slams shut, protecting Luke - for the moment. It won't withstand the onslaught for long.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Outer Door leads deeper into the facility, towards Luke. It won't withstand Darth Vader for long.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText:
The door smashes inward, startling Luke who looks up from his work.

"Keep him busy!", he shouts. "I only need one more minute!"

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Right behind the Inner Door lies the room where Luke is trying to sabotage the facility.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText: The door slams shut, protecting Luke - for the moment. It won't withstand the onslaught for long.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Right behind the Inner Door lies the room where Luke is trying to sabotage the facility.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText:
As the last of you falls back with injuries on your bodies, a shout of triumph emerges from the Imperial troops.

Darth Vader, however, remains silent, except for the mechanical breathing and the hum of his lightsaber. Instead of finishing you off, he immediately turns his attention towards Luke.

{-} <color="red">Darth Vader</color> can now attack Luke.
{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> finishes his activation adjacent to Luke, he attacks him.

eventActions.newInstructions:
{-} This figure discards each Harmful condition, then suffers 1 {H} for each condition discarded. If this figure would be defeated, it is not defeated until the end of this activation.
{A} Move 4 towards the sabotage site.
{A} Open a door within 3 spaces of this figure.
{A} Move 4 towards the sabotage site.
{-} FORCE PULL: Place the two closest Stormtroopers or <color="red">Stormtroopers</color> adjacent to this figure.
{-} Attack Luke.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Luke Skywalker is hastily trying to finish his work. He knows that Vader is almost upon him.

{-} When <color="red">Darth Vader</color> finishes his activation adjacent to Luke, he attacks him.

events.eventText: The doors cannot be closed again.
Alarms begin to blare throughout the station as more Imperials are alerted to your presence. A fresh squad of stormtroopers rushes in to aid Vader in his advance.
As Vader's rage builds,  you feel a dark energy mounting around you as the Sith Lord manipulates the dark side of the Force to his advantage.

mapEntities.mainText:
The Outer Door leads deeper into the facility, towards Luke.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

Right behind the Inner Door lies the room where Luke is trying to sabotage the facility.

The door is locked. A figure can attack it (Health: 5, Defense: 1 {G}).

Luke Skywalker is hastily trying to finish his work.

{-} When all heroes are wounded, <color="red">Darth Vader</color> can attack Luke.

This terminal controls the doors.

{-} Once per activation, a hero can interact with a terminal ({I}) to close the open door closest to Luke. Doors that have been opened after setup cannot be closed again.
{-} Each door can only be closed once. If it is opened again, it is destroyed and cannot be closed again.
